description:
Mineral based sunscreen for those who like to stay as close to ‘au naturel’ as possible. Sun Bum’s Mineral sunscreen uses zinc as its primary active ingredient to protects your skin from harmful UVA and UVB.

  • Broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection
  • Non-greasy formula
  • Moisturizing zinc based formula (non-nano)
  • Water resistant rating of 80 minutes
  • Gluten, paraben, oxybenzone and octinoxate free
  • Ingredients: zinc oxide 20.0%, water, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, butyloctyl salicylate, diheptyl succinate, methyl dihydroabietate, butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), fragrance, capryloyl glycerin/sebacic acid copolymer, sodium stearoyl glutamate, cetearyl alcohol, theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, coco-glucoside, tocopherol, microcrystalline cellulose, cellulose gum, bisabolol, cetyl alcohol, arachidyl alcohol, behenyl alcohol, arachidyl glucoside, polyhydroxystearic acid, sodium hyaluronate, sodium gluconate, phenoxyethanol, ethylhexylglycerin and citric acid
name: Sun Bum Mineral SPF 50 Lotion 88ml
